#### Description
UL16-binding protein 1 ([ULBP1](https://www.uniprot.org/uniprot/Q9BZM6)). Binds and activates the KLRK1/NKG2D receptor, mediating natural killer cell cytotoxicity.

<br> 

#### Clinical trials 
[NCT04107142](https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT04107142) - Colorectal Cancer, Prostate Cancer, Sarcoma

<br>
